Package org.svvrl.goal.cmd

Class DefaultCommandExtension

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.cmd.DefaultCommandExtension
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommandDescriptor, CommandExtension
public class DefaultCommandExtension
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandExtension
This class provides a default implementation of CommandExtension. The initial values of command name, full name, and help message are all empty strings. The initial value of the class of commands provided by this extension is null.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
